text: ninnal nanma pravartticcal atinre gunam ninnalkkutanneyan. tinma ceytal atinre deasavum ninnalkkutanne. ninnale ariyicca rantu sandarbhannalil avasanattetinre samayamayappeal ninnale marru satrukkal kilppetutti; avar ninnalute mukham cittayakkanum adyatavana palliyil katannuvannapeale ittavanayum katannucellanum kayyil kkittiyatellam takarttukalayanum venti
